ActJudges Act
SubjectAllan Michael Stewart ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY ** Supreme Court of British Columbia
PrecisResignation and granting of an annuity to the Hon. ALLAN MICHAEL STEWART, a judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective August 1, 2011.
AttachmentsAttachment
